Core - IDE
Stable

See: Description

Core - IDE 
Package Description
org.netbeans.api.core.ide  

This module contains various generic IDE-like extensions.

What is New (see all changes)?

  • Apr 1 '09 Annotation to register Nodes into Services tab

    Use ServicesTabNodeRegistration to register your nodes into Services in the IDE.

Use Cases

Register Node in Services tab
Use ServicesTabNodeRegistration to register your nodes into Services in the IDE.

This table lists all of the module exported APIs with defined stability classifications. It is generated based on answers to questions about the architecture of the module. Read them all...
Group of java interfaces
Interface NameIn/OutStabilitySpecified in What Document?
core.ideExportedStable

Right now this module provides handy ServicesTabNodeRegistration accompanied with few UI elements.

Implementation Details

Where are the sources for the module?

The sources for the module are in the NetBeans Mercurial repositories.
